data.title: Jason Reitman
data.text:
Born: 19-Oct-1977

Birthplace: Montreal, Quebec, Canada

Gender: Male

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Film Director

Nationality: Canada

Executive summary: Up in the Air

Father: Ivan Reitman (film director, b. 27-Oct-1946)

Mother: Geneviève Robert

Sister: Catherine

Sister: Caroline

Wife: Michele Lee (m. 5-Sep-2004, one child)

High School: Harvard-Westlake School, Los Angeles, CA (1995)

University: University of Southern California

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

The Front Runner (31-Aug-2018)

Tully (23-Jan-2018)

Men, Women & Children (6-Sep-2014)

Labor Day (30-Aug-2013)

Young Adult (9-Dec-2011)

Up in the Air (5-Sep-2009)

Juno (1-Sep-2007)

Thank You for Smoking (9-Sep-2005)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

21 Years: Richard Linklater (7-Nov-2014)

Father's Day (9-May-1997)

Dave (7-May-1993)

Kindergarten Cop (21-Dec-1990) · Kissing Boy

Ghostbusters II (16-Jun-1989) · Brownstone Boy #2

Twins (9-Dec-1988) · Granger Grandson
